Transact with ease and speed

Hi [client name],

Did you know Help2Pay lets you deposit and withdraw funds with the convenience and confidence of using your local bank?

With Help2Pay, you can move money in and out of your Deriv account in a quick, secure, and easy manner.

Here’s how to get started:

Important: Your bank needs to be supported by Help2Pay

Step 1

Log in to your Deriv account and go to the Cashier.

Step 2

Select Deposit via bank wire, credit card, and e-wallet.

Step 3

Select the Help2Pay icon.

Step 4

Select your bank from the list of banks and enter your desired amount.

Step 5

Enter your bank account credentials and confirm your request. Your Deriv account will be credited upon receiving approval from the bank.

Note: You can view transaction times on our website.

Log in to your Deriv account and try it out now!
Go to Cashier

If you have any questions, please contact us via live chat.
